name: Horbo
description:
Explore a procedurally generated labyrinth with infinite floors of increasing size, but  beware of its inhabitants.

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move
  • Mouse to look around (you can change sensitivity in the pause menu)
  • Esc/Q to pause

WebGL version might take up to a few minutes to load.

Made with Unity for Scream Jam 2021.
